title: Add the application as a service at Windows Server
excerpt: You can add the service with PowerShell. New-Service and Get-service are available in PowerShell 5, for ‘Remove-Service’ PowerShell >= 6 required. Otherwise you can use ‘sc.exe DELETE MyMegaServiceApplication’. You should execute it with as an administrator. Not any application you can start a service. title: Add user to Nginx folder
excerpt: Create a group in Linux with command line :sudo addgroup nginxusers sudo usermod -a -G nginxusers newusername

title: Fishing a-la 'Deutsche Post' in Germany from Canada
excerpt: Paper mail is very popular in Germany. People send the letters if they need to do it or even if they don’t need one. To send the letter costs from 0,85 € cents to 2.75€ and it depends on the size of the letter. Today I’ve got the sms «Ihr Paket DE14127482 wird im Zollzentrum […]

title: ID numbers dramatically increased with MS SQL in Docker
excerpt: I work with a WebApi project in Net.Core and MS SQL Database. MS SQL server is executed in Docker container. Suddenly I found out, that ID field value with autoincrement has increased from 2 to 1001.

title: How to adapt SharePoint online workbench.aspx for a full width solution
excerpt: When you are developing SPFX application for SharePoint online, you use a page https://{sharepoint_url}/sites/{some_subsite}/_layouts/15/workbench.aspx. For non-fullwidth webparts it fits normally, but if you need to create a wide or full-width webpart, it’s not very comfortable.

title: C# method to create a UNC directory recursively and return the path
excerpt: I will write down the useful method. I used it several times and it works good. It’s C# method to create a UNC directory recursively and return the path.

title: Create .Net application with RabbitMQ on your local machine
excerpt: If you want to write an application which uses RabbitMQ, I advise you to use docker image of Rabbit. It’s lightweight and can be easily executed.
